task.title: Where to go Incase of an Emergency
task.shortdesc: In the event that there is an emergency in the building and you are required to leave the building you will need to find the nearest exit and get at least 30 feet away from the building.

taskbody.context: Below are the steps to follow incase of an emergency

step.cmd: If you are on the third floor in room 360 find the nearest stairwell right outside the door and slowly walk down to the first floor then exit the building through the front building entrance.
If you are on the first floor, exit the classroom and take a left, then walk towards the front building entrance.
Once outside the building walk at least 30 feet from the building to allow safety personal an unobstructed path into the building.
When the emergency is cleared and you are allowed back into the building slowly walk back to the classroom.
